name: Basketball Manager!
description:
Let the domination begin!

Turn your basketball players into superstars by bringing them the tools they need. Unlock various areas to improve them even more!

Train your squad, manage your club's workers and improve yourself to become one of the best out there!
developers: Anka Studios Yazilim ve Pazarlama Limited Sirketi
publishers: Anka Studios Yazilim ve Pazarlama Limited Sirketi
